title: Artificial Neural Network Implementation Project Through Self-Learning Chip Design (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of electronics, programming experience, and basic neural network concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning emphasizing hands-on digital environments and bio-inspired design methodologies

learning_goals: Basic ANN algorithms can be applied to self-learning chip design
Circuits can be designed to solve simple conditioned reflex tasks using biologically inspired design principles
Network-level self-learning systems can be implemented by integrating individual circuit modules
Constraints in the chip design process can be analyzed, and optimization strategies proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
